title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       There's always something happening at Capulin Volcano! Capulin Volcano National Monument strives to keep the public informed about new events which occur with the park by providing press releases to local and regional new providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site, Facebook, and Twitter.  The park also publishes the Capulin Chronicle, a bi-annual newsletter communicating all the exciting things that take place at Capulin Volcano.
